Scripts.OnLoad:
self.TSM = IsAddOnLoaded("TradeskillMaster") self.UMJ = IsAddOnLoaded("TheUndermineJournal") self.ATOR = IsAddOnLoaded("Auctionator")
if (self.TSM or self.UMJ or self.ATOR) then self:RegisterEvent("LOOT_READY") self.lastTime = 0 else print(L.NoSource) end
Scripts.OnEvent: if (event == "LOOT_READY" and self.lastTime ~= time()) then LootAlert_OnEvent(self, event, ...) self.lastTime = time() end
